Name: Base Station License, 1431 Car Service, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by 1431 Car Service, Inc., doing business as Three Guys Car Service and submitted as Three Guys Car Service, for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by 1431 Car Service, Inc., doing business as Three Guys Car Service and submitted as Three Guys Car Service, for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 1431A Rockaway Parkway in the borough of Brooklyn is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#906
